paper.title: Dual vectors and lower bounds for the nearest lattice point problem

author.org: Laboratory for Comp. Science, M. I. T., Cambridge, USA

paper.publisher: Springer Science and Business Media LLC
paper.abstract: We prove that given a point\(\overline z \) outside a given latticeL then there is a dual vector which gives a fairly good estimate for how far from the lattice the vector is. To be more precise, there is a set of translated hyperplanesHi, such thatL⊂∪iHi andd(\(\overline z \)∪iHi)≧(6n2+1)−1d(\(\overline z \),L).
